mapper.insert: insert into order_centre (id, address_id, user_id, user_nick_name, order_time, status, remark, creator, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select id, address_id, user_id, user_nick_name, order_time, status, remark, creator, create_time, update_time from order_centre where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
